de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.transport

Interface TransportListener


  • public interface TransportListener
    Listener which is notified to receive a message buffer and when the TransportConnection is closed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyClose()
      Notifies the listener that the TransportConnection is closed.
      void receive(ByteBuffer buffer)
      Receives a data buffer from the TransportConnection for further processing.

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        void receive(ByteBuffer buffer)
             throws ListenerClosedException
        Receives a data buffer from the TransportConnection for further processing.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the data buffer with data
        Throws:
        ListenerClosedException - in case, that the listener is closed

      • notifyClose

        void notifyClose()
        Notifies the listener that the TransportConnection is closed.
